title: Get Help from Auntie Ethel
content:
d have known better - hags don't help anyone but themselves.

Choosing dialogue 2 does not convince Mayrina that she will make a good mother and is upset that her child will meet their dead father upon bringing home her husbands coffin. After this conversation, Mayrina runs away. Head out to the Acrid workshop and on the table (X:-418, Y:601) you will be able to pick up a wand called Bitter Divorce.
